_header: Take a webster that is leal

CamMagPep2553.Transcription:
Take a wobster þat is leillAnd a myllar þat will not
                    steillwith ane preist þat is not gredyAnd lay ane deid corps
                    þame byAnd throw virtew of þir threThat deid corps sall
                    qwyknyt be
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.412.
